channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: A nonprofit leader, a social worker: Here are the stories of the people on Biden’s clemency list
item.description: Among the roughly 1,500 people whose sentences were commuted or who were pardoned by President Joe Biden are a nonprofit leader who supports at-risk youth, a social worker who fosters animals and a counselor and recovery coach.

item.title: Back trouble and brain fog bothered suspect in UnitedHealthcare CEO killing, his posts show
McDonald’s employee who called 911 in CEO’s shooting is eligible for a reward, but it will take time
